fields.Title: PLAZA ORB / spirit bomb ready
fields.Description: A thought orb to pop up just before the Mercenary Tribunal

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "I can talk you out of it, whatever..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I can talk you out of it, whatever it is.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You are prepared. Don't put away yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You are prepared. Don't put away your friend. Your weapon.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Snowflakes speck the barrels of you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snowflakes speck the barrels of your Nachtwey A80 pistol.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Good. Be ready to take damage."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good. Be ready to take damage.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Snowflakes stick to your prybar. Or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snowflakes stick to your prybar. Or crowbar. Or prybar. Call it what you will -- it doesn't stand a chance against military-grade weaponry.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Now. It is time."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop. Now. It is time.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You are prepared. Don't put away yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You are prepared. Don't put away your friend. Your weapon. It is glowing in your hand, ready to serve.

fields.Title: Composure: "The oily tail end of your necktie-t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The oily tail end of your necktie-turned-fuse glistens in the cool spring light.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Water streams down your prybar. Or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Water streams down your prybar. Or crowbar. Or prybar. Call it what you will -- it doesn't stand a chance against military-grade weaponry.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "You try to take comfort in the weig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You try to take comfort in the weight of your prybar. Or crowbar. Or prybar. Call it what you will -- it doesn't stand a chance against military-grade weaponry.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then you'd better get ready." He f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then you'd better get ready." He frowns, then quickly adds, "Whatever happens, I've got your back."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Your old friend has prepared you fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your old friend has prepared you for this -- at great cost to himself. Make sure you have the spirit bomb in your hand when *shit goes south*.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You're too likable to die. Don't wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're too likable to die. Don't worry.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Just up ahead: danger."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop. Just up ahead: danger.

fields.Title: Authority: "What?! You can't compare the sidear..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What?! You can't compare the sidearm issued to you personally by the RCM to the pistol of a known criminal?

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You are prepared. Don't put away yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You are prepared. Don't put away your friend. Your weapon.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Crisis, death. You can feel it in y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Crisis, death. You can feel it in your blue soul.

fields.Title: Composure: "Snow gathers on the oily fabric of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snow gathers on the oily fabric of the tail end of your necktie-turned-fuse.

fields.Title: You: "I'm ready to do this."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm ready to do this.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Your Kvalsund KR+2 Multi-Tool looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your Kvalsund KR+2 Multi-Tool looks impressive, shining in the cold spring light -- but what can it do against military-grade weaponry?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Wait -- your old friend has prepare..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait -- your old friend has prepared you for this -- at great cost to himself. Make sure you have the spirit bomb in your hand when *shit goes south*.

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, there's danger. Up ahead.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, there's danger. Up ahead."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Snowflakes speck the barrels of you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snowflakes speck the barrels of your Villiers 9mm pistol.

fields.Title: Logic: "There really isn't much of a differ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There really isn't much of a difference between these two guns...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "This is not the time to discuss pre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is not the time to discuss preferences. It's not just your own life that will be at stake.
fields.Alternate1: And you think you're off to die an honourable death? What about the lives of the people depending on you?

fields.Title: You: "Time for the tribunal?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Time for the tribunal?

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Raindrops slip from the barrels of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Raindrops slip from the barrels of your Villiers 9mm pistol.

fields.Title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It would be better if you didn't ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It would be better if you didn't have to. It's not just your own life that will be at stake.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Statistically speaking, sabres have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Statistically speaking, sabres have proven to be rather ineffective against advanced military technology.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Do what you need to do. And then ke..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Do what you need to do. And then keep moving toward the future.

fields.Title: You: "I prefer hand-to-hand combat."
fields.Dialogue Text: I prefer hand-to-hand combat.
fields.Alternate1: "I prefer hand-to-hand combat. It's more honourable."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "This isn't the time for fear. Go."
fields.Dialogue Text: This isn't the time for fear. Go.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "You know what you should do? Take o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You know what you should do? Take out the spirit bomb...

fields.Title: You: "Time to party?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Time to party?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Be prepared. Wield Ruby's double-ba..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Be prepared. Wield Ruby's double-barrelled pistol.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear what sounds like an enthus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear what sounds like an enthusiastic gurgling coming from the spirit bomb in your pocket.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No, no. You cannot get off that eas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, no. You cannot get off that easy. This is serious. Lives are at stake.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. I hear commotion..." He cups..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. I hear commotion..." He cups his ear. "Let's go."

fields.Title: You: "I'm scared..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm scared...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Just up ahead: danger."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop. Just up ahead: danger.

fields.Title: Authority: "What a shitty gun. But it's better..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What a shitty gun. But it's better than nothing.

fields.Title: Composure: "Raindrops slip down the oily fabric..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Raindrops slip down the oily fabric of the tail end of your necktie-turned-fuse.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "For God's sake -- find some bullets..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For God's sake -- find some bullets before you go any further. An unloaded gun won't do you any good!

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Arm yourself with anything you can...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Arm yourself with anything you can. Unless you have... nothing? Because you didn't find your lost gun? Then just walk to your death.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Shush. He's not drinking the spirit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shush. He's not drinking the spirit bomb. He's putting it in his hand and he's going to be ready.

fields.Title: Authority: "Why don't you take out your trusty..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why don't you take out your trusty Villiers instead?

fields.Title: You: "I'll feel prepared as soon as I swi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'll feel prepared as soon as I switch out my real police gun.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "For God's sake -- find some bullets..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For God's sake -- find some bullets before you go any further. An unloaded gun won't do you any good!

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Your fingers reflexively reach for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your fingers reflexively reach for the Villiers 9mm pistol in your pocket.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Raindrops slip from the barrels of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Raindrops slip from the barrels of your Nachtwey A80 pistol.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "What you have isn't enough. You'll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What you have isn't enough. You'll need more firepower. A ranged weapon.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Wait -- your old friend has prepare..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait -- your old friend has prepared you for this -- at great cost to himself. Make sure you have the spirit bomb in your hand when *shit goes south*.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Yes. And it's not going to be fun."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. And it's not going to be fun.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "It is."
fields.Dialogue Text: It is.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The barrels of your Villiers 9mm pi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The barrels of your Villiers 9mm pistol shine threateningly in the cold spring light.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The barrels of your Nachtwey A80 pi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The barrels of your Nachtwey A80 pistol shine threateningly in the cold spring light.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Just up ahead: danger."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop. Just up ahead: danger.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Snowflakes stick to your Kvalsund K..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Snowflakes stick to your Kvalsund KR+2 Multi-Tool. It looks impressive -- but what can it do against military-grade weaponry?

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not sure I feel ready for what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not sure I feel ready for what lies ahead."

fields.Title: You: "I'll fight with my bare hands if I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'll fight with my bare hands if I have to.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Just up ahead: danger."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop. Just up ahead: danger.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Statistically speaking, sabres have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Statistically speaking, sabres have proven to be rather ineffective against advanced military technology.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "For God's sake -- find some bullets..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For God's sake -- find some bullets before you go any further. An unloaded gun won't do you any good!

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Be prepared. Make sure you have you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Be prepared. Make sure you have your pepperbox in your hand.

fields.Title: You: "Sounds ominous."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sounds ominous.

fields.Title: You: "For what?"
fields.Dialogue Text: For what?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Yours included."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yours included.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Water streams down your Kvalsund KR..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Water streams down your Kvalsund KR+2 Multi-Tool. It looks impressive -- but what can it do against military-grade weaponry?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Time for grim, serious, deadly, dan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Time for grim, serious, deadly, dangerous. It's not going to be fun.

fields.Title: You: "What am I supposed to do?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What am I supposed to do?

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Statistically speaking, sabres have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Statistically speaking, sabres have proven to be rather ineffective against  military technology.
